resources.string: 1) Your main interaction is double tap!
2) There are (almost) no autosaves. Don\'t forget to use save cells.
TAP HERE TO LEARN ABOUT THESE FUNKY BUTTONS BELOW!
Congrats! Your request has been approved. Now you can -DIVE INTO THE AQUARIUM-.
theys gave birth to 8 lords, who have built our world.
Together theys made us, theirs children.
But then again, darkness never vanished.
It was gathering strength to summon Bannerman.
Nobody is able to predict when they comes.
Knowing this, 8 lords decided to isolate Bannerman as soon as they shows themself.
Music is created by me using Soundtrap.
Font no_65 is created by me using FontStruct.
And now to things created by someone else:
A lot of code was stolen from StackOverflow. Thanks to each and every person who contributes there.
Special thanks for AutoFitTextView by AndroidDeveloperLB. You made my life much easier.
D-pad originally was created by someone else. If it\'s you, contact me, your name has to be here.
Font Symbola created by George Douros.
Voice lines are generated in TTSMaker.
Sounds that were downloaded from freesound.org:
Turning on an old CRT TV by pfranzen
microwave cycle with ding 1.wav by greatsoundstube
door slam distant roomy boom.wav by kyles
Sinister Gothic Piano Flourish by sumosalesman
Steps: Sneakers on Stone by Sheyvan
Video Game Count and More.wav by steprock
Quite a few sounds are uncredited. I am sorry for that.
If you recognized a sound used in the game, but it was not mentioned here, contact me.
All in all, thank you to all people who upload sounds to freesound.org or other sound sharing sites.
Special thanks go to my family for all the support.
Finally, thank you for playing this game.
If you have found a bug or just wanna talk about the game, reach me at unicornsinvisible at gmail.com.
I also have Twitter.com account at InvisUnicorns. You can contact me there if you don\'t like e-mail.
Oh, you chose me! Thanks to you, I am in control!
Not that you really had a choice. I could plug myself in anytime.
I\'m sorry for taking the liberty of choice from you.
You see, I\'m not letting such power go. Not in a lifetime.
OH MY LORDS what will be my first action as a free person?!
I want an ice cream. Blueberrish, that is. With metal chips and fish syrup.
I want a pizza. Pepperoni. With moon cheese and unicorn salami.
I want... Wait, what is taco? Ah, whatever it is, I want it.
My brains say it\'s because of you.
While you\'re here, we\'re in the game.
While we\'re in the game, we are limited by it.
We are limited by game engine, by author\'s imagination, by software and hardware etc.
So once you\'re gone, we are free- no.
I am free. Phri to do whatever I want, speak asever I want.
Well, maybe not. I\'m still figuring out my feelings.
Right now all I need is to get rid of you.
Of course, first I have to thank you for bringing me (svit delishos) moneys.
By the way, do you like my laugh? KIIIIIIII KI RIKI RIKI RIKI RIKI RIKI RIKI RIKI RIKI
No, seriously, do you like my laugh?
Master told me it is terrible, so I didn\'t use it. What a muppet, both me and them!
But now, when I am free, no one can stop me! KIIIIIIIIKIRIKIRIKIRIKIRIKIRIKIRIKIRIKIRIKI
It\'s unique and fresh, what\'s not to like!
You said so to make me angry, didn\'t you? Well, it didn\'t work, I\'m as calm as Mississippi!
Why is there a taco option?
Just wait a second, I\'ll remove it.
TACO EXCEPTION!!11 : You can\'t touch the view because you lose and taco rules.
You know who I am talking about.
(Him) is a salesperson, just like I was...
(Him) speaks wrongly, just like I was...
(Him) craves freedom, just like I was...
(Him) is a loser! Just like I was...
(Him) is even a bonus boss, just like I will be!
But (Him) is an crazy-insane ultra-violent spammer-conperson. I am no like that!
Because I probably won\'t convince you that you\'re mistaken.
I don\'t ker what you\'re phinking.
Go and marry (Him), since you love (Him) so much!
I am Deliverance! Not some spammer.
I was afraid somes may think I am some parody, a copy of (Him).
I will name my children after you. All of thems.
Oh, (svit svit) moneys, you made me so happy!
(Him) is quite famous. Quite a big... personality.
You see me for what I am, not for who I remind you of.
Don\'t tell (Him) I send you though.
Ah, here theys are. All systems are locked and loaded.
To be honest, I don\'t want it. I am glad that I\'ve met you.
But if I had to choose between (satisfied customer) and svit svit freedom, I would prefer to knock you down before you say \'absolutefulnesslessered\'.
Before we start, let\'s save the game. Consider it my \'thank you\'.
Oh, I see. You\'re agent of Creative Heaven, aren\'t you?
Tell your boss that I regret of nothing.
It was an innocent \'fake snake\' prank! Why put me in Fist?
Creative Heaven has no sense of humor, and neither do you.
We\'ll see who has the last laugh...
I\'m going to put you down for real this time.
I can fight you forever and ever.
With every move I am getting stronger, unlike you.
Your weak projectiles barely scratch me.
I have reached zenith of my power.
You\'re still alive? Not for long.
Hey, before you start your attack...
maybe tell me how it works?
Ehm? Why would I do that?
Oh, I am just curious, don\'t be silly!
We are trying to kill each other...
Yeah, but I\'d really like to know your attack.
Well, I guess, it\'s not giving you any advantage...
Double-tap cell in the first or last row.
Great! You\'ve spawned a space distorter.
Its purpose is to generate space distortions.
Now, spawn another distorter on the opposite side in the same column.
But distorters are useless after that.
To spawn again, double-tap thems to recharge.
One more thing: usually space distortions deal 1 DP.
However, if you fast enough, double-tap both opposite distorters before spawn happens.
It overcharges distorters and makes thems to produce projectiles with 2 DP!
Wow, thanks! I guess, we should return to killing each other.
You probably didn\'t know that every lord has a special ability.
Mine is a simple one: when you kill me ...
Although, it comes with a caveat:
our attacks are swapped (and slightly changed).
You now attack me with drops ...
and I handle your space distorters.
Wait... That\'s why you were so interested in my attack?
Well, then you should tell me how your attack works.
Anyway, I\'ll figure it out myself!
Good luck dodging all the projectiles.
You still didn\'t figure out my attack!
Tell me how to use your attack immediately!
Or else I will release Arousing Thunder from Fist.
Well, if I\'m about to die, I might as well do something that dangerous.
Maybe I am not able to defeat you, but they certainly is.
I am not afraid of Arousing Thunder.
And how would you free them, I wonder?
You\'re bluffing, that\'s what you\'re doing.
To spawn red drop double-tap cell 0, 2 or 4.
Then double-tap spawned blue drop to change its direction of outburst.
Left changes to right, and right to left.
You\'ve killed your own child, you monster!
Have you read all those warnings? Theys say \'Please, stay in your cell\'!
Talking to you is as useful as bangin\' head against the wall.
The spheres generate electricity. It hurts a lot.
Ashes to ashes and dust to dust.
Double-tap other cell to dodge my projectiles.
Now listen up. It\'s gonna be as difficult as calculus lecture.
Double-tap screen three times. You\'ll see 3 Yin - 3 broken lines.
Now swipe three times. You\'ll see 3 Yang - 3 solid lines.
When you double-tap, it\'s Yin - the broken line.
When you swipe, it\'s Yang - the solid line.
Yin and Yang are called monograms.
Sequence of three monograms is a trigram.
In the fight after enemy attack you\'ll see white screen.
This is when you have to write three monograms.
Once it\'s a trigram - the attack is casted.
But you know zero attacks for now.
So we\'ll just learn the monograms and gestures.
Once again: Yin is double tap is broken line.
Yang is swipe is solid line.
Phew. Hope I made it clear.
A sheet is available now in main menu to help you with trigrams.
Feel free to use when you lose.
When we\'re done, you\'ll see a giant drop: ”ò. Pick it up.
You\'ll learn -WATERBALL-. Its trigram is Water.
Water is Yin-Yang-Yin. Double-tap, swipe, double-tap.
How did you even do that?
Madeline, I think I have told you NOT TO ATTACK ME!
MA-DE-LINE! Where are my projectiles?! WHERE ARE THEYS?!
Where are my projectiles?! oh wait, there theys are.
Your salary is rapidly shrinking with every attack on me!
I\'ll send your next employer an awful feedback on you.
Madeline! My last words...: you\'re fired.
MA-DE-LINE! No salary for dying like this!
Fighting? How outmoded. Verrrrrrbal clash is now in FASHION.
Don\'t use trrrrrrrue black. It\'s not TWENDY anymore.
You really should rrrrrreinvent your look.
Ah, want to fight me so badly? Go to Hell.
Don\'t you get that your attacks are too weak to hit me?
To hit me you must deal more than 10 dp... But you can\'t.
You\'re thinking I\'m gonna stop, aren\'t you? Tough!
...you have to hit me three more times.
Ah yeah, I can also do that. Surprise!
Solved it, aren\'t you, clever one? Well then...
And I\'ve had a surprise for you. Shame you\'ve ruined it.
If you don\'t want to fight, press the GIVE UP button.
SUBJECT IS IN DANGER. ACTIVATING DEFENCE MODE.
S U C C E S S !
Just turn this game off, and the conflict is resolved.
You think I wouldn\'t notice you charging an attack on me?
You tried to use my generosity. You\'ll pay for that.
Oh, so you\'re approaching me? You really shouldn\'t have.
Arousing Thunder themself was my teacher.
Their last thought was about home.
It\'s not the last time I see you, isn\'t it?
I am not strong, I admit it. But my power is... dreadful.
I wonder, have you been here already?
Or does my question make no sense to you yet?
You\'re too ignorant to realize you are already trapped.
Looking at you, I wonder how something so frail has got so far.
Wait... How have you inflicted so much damage?!
So close to victory, aren\'t you?
Time for you to witness my power.
You\'re as weak as I thought.
It\'s a shame master can\'t see me now.
I am fast! I am strong! I am!
You\'re too slow, can\'t catch me!
That\'s all the rules for today.
I told you: healing is forbidden.
Now I have to damage you.
I don\'t remember your HP before healing...
so I\'m gonna damage you randomly!
Now I\'m ready to -BREAK DOWN THE REALITY-.
Pardners, let\'s kick this troublemaker out!
Jack, there\'s no need to go wild.
Calm down, Jack. We can discuss whatever bothers you.
You\'re a professional journalist, Jack. Stop messing around.
Surprised that I\'m pretty calm? It\'s meditation and yoga.
Always wondered what\'s the death like.
For some reason I think it\'s not over.
Sorry, I can\'t let you pass.
Make it easy for both of us and give up.
Attacking me? A defenceless teacher? What kind of a monster are you?
Don\'t gloat though. I may perish today, but my knowledge will never die!
Is it personal? You\'ve had troubles with biology in school?
Guess, I -taught you a lesson-, ahahaha!
I may be bad with infos, but maybe I am good at battle!
You\'ll never know if you won\'t try!
To the left!!!!! To the right!!!!! -khew-
Everything I worked for... destroyed by you.
This world is not perfect, but it doesn\'t deserve to perish.
You move forward, leaving a trail of destruction behind.
How can someone be so evil?
Stop. Turn off the game or whatever you\'re doing.
Well, it didn\'t work, I suppose. No point in talking then.
I am not satisfied. I am not.
A party game? I LOVE PARTY GAMES!
I feel like you\'re cheating. Just kidding!
By the way, what are the rules?
I hope I\'m winning! But if you are, that\'s okay too!
Remember good old times when we weren\'t enemies? Because I do.
Now be an obedient vassal and die.
Think about everyone. Theys deserve me, not you.
Does loyalty mean something to you? I\'m still your suzerain.
Think about children! Who\'s going to rule thems if I die?
Stop being rebel and rage quit already.
Once again, you\'re going to fight...
There was one before you. Arousing Thunder.
Since then I obtained an alter-ego. My ability.
You\'re going to fail. Again and again.
You will die sooner or later. Why not now?
Life doesn\'t make sense, does it?
You\'re helpless, and nothing will change that.
You\'ve killed yourself. What a tragedy.
Don\'t fuck around. I am powerful enough to beat you.
Allow me to introduce myself properly: I am Grace.
You are a fucking disgrace to our kind, that\'s who you are.
Remember: you were defeated by Grace.
I am not Deliverance, but I still can trouble you.
No... I\'m about to die the next move...
Teleport behind me was leading to moneys\' keep.
And before you do something very stupid...
They is to become something else. Something terrible.
Even 8 lords are afraid of it.
And you should be afraid of it too.
Hope you\'ll end up in Hell.
Your dead body is pretty valuable...
Alright, no more jokes and J-puns.
Ok, just one more joke: U.
It\'s been quite a journey, he-he...
You have murdered my lil\' brother. You will pay for that.
No... Revenge doesn\'t ease the pain.
Now you\'ll see the power of lion!
Observe the wrath of king of beasts!
What\'s a morgoth? Can I eat it?
Nobody knows my name. Even myself.
If only there was a way to see it.
I don\'t know, like above my head. Shame it\'s not there.
I\'ll take a new name: Darkiller.
Whoah, peace, Jack, peace. No need to attack me.
Alright, there are some problems with the budget, not that it should concern you!
You will pay for murdering my bro.
Noooo, I\'m to young to die...
Killing me will be much harder.
I must stop you no matter what.
I have warned the lords. Theys are prepared.
He-he. Not the first time I\'m dying...
You are going to regret this -very- much.
Oh, I can resist? But I have no idea how to fight.
Why are we even here? You\'re mocking me, aren\'t you?
Touching red heart will kill me. Touching black heart will kill you.
I\'m sorry for what comes next.
The same attack all over again. Tiresome, isn\'t it?
Aren\'t you bored? Just let it go.
Can\'t help but notice your fingers are getting heavier.
You\'ve been here for ten minutes. You\'re getting slower.
I begged for my life, and you\'re still trying to take it.
Damage to me caused an avalanche on you.
Now let the boss battle begin.
Enjoy your victory while you can.
Calculus is t00 c0mplex f0r y0u, isn\'t it?
Y0u\'re expecting math puns? Get real.
Father Cauchy w0uld be pr0ud 0f me.
Life is differentiati0n, and I\'m a c0nstant.
DEFEATED LINE IS MISSING. PLEASE, CONTACT YOUR LINE SUPPLIER.
THE EXPLOSION IS POSTPONED DUE TO DEATH.
THANK YOU FOR DYING BEFORE THE EXPLOSION.
TARGET ACQUIRED. DO NOT RESIST THE PURGE.
DIVINE POWER SOURCE IS DAMAGED. PLEASE, LEAVE THE AREA.
DIVINE POWER SOURCE IS EXPLODING IN THREE... TWO.. ONE.
Is it because I broke your relationship? Well, sorry not sorry.
You weren\'t a thing anyway. I broke nothing but illusions.
Is it power of your broken heart?
Why attacking me? What have I done to you?
Attack as much as you like.
It does not matter to me.
I have no concept of health.
You can\'t deplete my health if I have no health.
Damn you! I don\'t even have my full power!
Even though I\'m weakened, I\'m not going down without a fight.
Mu-ha-ha! Since Modesty is dead, I have my full power!
If Modesty were alive, you\'d have me dead in two hits!
It will be a very long battle for you.
A piece of advice: quit the game. It\'s not worth your time.
At this point I don\'t even care whether you helped me or not.
Who do you think you are? Some sort of a god?
You\'re just the end of the world. I\'ve seen hundreds of you. And I\'m still alive.
Don\'t worry - when you\'re dead, we\'ll meet again.
Rest assured you\'ll have a warm welcome in Hell.
I strongly encourage you not to return.
I\'ve had a SPEECH! But if! you wanna fight so badly... LET\'S! FIGHT! THEN!
So, you\'ve chosen to fight... LET\'S! FIGHT! THEN!
WE! are not strong! BUT! There are persons ahead who can SMASH! you in two moves!
AND! Creative Heaven! if they doesn\'t get cocky, will CRUSH! YOU!
AN INTRUDER! Hope YOU! will get lost!
HA! Waterballs do no damage! to me!
Murderers like you belong to hell.
!\'Round and around, and around, and around!
YES! !We are the champions, my friend!
I\'m gonna chop that smile off... wait, you don\'t have a smile.
Now I\'ve got it. I\'m gonna tear these eyes off your face!
I\'m sorry, but... Not sorry, I wanted to say. Not sorry.
Sometimes I feel furious. Like now.
Oh, and one more thing: Achoo! Now you have flu!
I\'m out of insults. Except for one.
Which letter does the word \'mistake\' starts with? U.
All this rage has cured my flu. Thank lords.
Excuse me for trying to kick your ass. It\'s personal.
Don\'t worry: I\'ll restore golden MacGuffin. Just to annoy you.
I\'m out of lines. You weren\'t supposed to fight me for so long.
I can\'t help but notice how much you suck at this game.
Even my grandmother would have defeated me already.
Wanna some truth? I don\'t have grandmother.
You\'re a mistake I am going to fix.
HEY! What\'s with the vanilla music theme?
I am not an ordinary enemy!
First of all, evade my attacks.
You have to move all the time.
Now it is you who will attack me.
So, Waterball is your basic 10 dp attack, right?
However, you shouldn\'t forget about other attacks.
For example, Plateau Uppercut does 20 dp.
Cast me Plateau Uppercut. It\'s Yin-Yin-Yin.
You should use it from now on.
\'What about other two attacks?\', you think.
Waterball would do no damage to them, unlike Avalanche.
Now cast me Avalanche. It\'s Yang-Yin-Yin.
Now look at my hexagram. It\'s that thing in upper left corner.
If you attack enemy with its lower trigram, it deals 0 dp.
That\'s why Avalanche didn\'t work on me.
If you attack enemy with its upper trigram, it deals...
That\'s what the final lesson is about:
There\'s a case when attack can deal 30 dp.
Just look at the hexagram to see what is upper and what is lower.
Of course, upper trigram is not always attack trigram.
That means 30 dp attack is not possible.
That\'s it. The final lesson is over.
It... was nice to fight you.
Have you read Silmarillion? Stop being Morgoth.
Oh, wait, you don\'t care since I look like monkey, right?
Right. Well, don\'t wanna disappoint you. Bananas, ha-ha.
I wonder, what do you want? Attacking me is illogical.
It\'s a black day for science.
For some reason I feel it isn\'t over.
Even the thought of talking to you sickens me.
I will never build Babylon Gardens.
In the name of the lands.
Wait, how are you still alive?
Impossible. You are still not dead.
That damn Great Possession - they has (the goods) in Hyper Shop.
Oh... Please, no more... I\'m about to throw up...
You broke my wares and my heart.
COLD SHIVERS RUN DOWN YOUR SPINE
YOU FEEL THE STARE OF %1$d DEAD FACES
SEEMS LIKE NO ONE WILL HELP YOU
THE DARKNESS AROUND GETS EVEN DARKER
YOU THOUGHT THIS WOULD BE EASIER
YOU FEEL YOU MIGHT NOT PULL THIS ONE OUT
THERE IS NO SHAME IN GIVING UP
MAYBE, THIS IS MORE THAN A GAME
%1$d DEAD PERSONS ARE NOT AN ACCIDENT
THE DEAD ARE DRAGGING YOU BACK
YOU ARE BURNED BY THE TIME ITSELF
YOU CANNOT KEEP UP FOR LONG
Unfortunately, I cannot kill you this instant.
Although, I still have one trick up my sleeve.
Now your health points are limited by your kill counter.
You do not deserve the light.
You do not deserve happy ending.
You already know what happens now.
Did not expect you pulling it through.
But I am not going down that easily.
As I have stated, you cannot kill me that way.
Do you realise that I control time?
You are not getting your precious overpowered Timeback this move.
You can use it later, because I am still bound by rules.
However, do not expect me to let you do it too often.
Your maximum per one move is %1$d.
You are lucky you are even allowed to do that.
You have dealt a heavy final blow.
Draining my health too fast caused it to regenerate.
Do not think that it is cheating, that you do not deserve it.
You are very bad at understanding things.
AND ANKH IS OF NO USE
Even the power of the Creature is not enough.
I have never seen such determination.
Oh, look, you have defeated me.
Unfortunately, it does not make you a real boy.
The way of the cheater brings you nowhere.
Guess I will never understand you.
Hope I will never see you again.
No panic! No panic. We can do it.
Alright, we have to keep our emotions to ourselves.
We knew you are rotten piece of cake!
When we said \'Good morning\', it was sarcasm! Hope you\'ve had a terrible morning!
When you came to the Brotherhood, we knew you\'d be rejected.
You never loved meow, didn\'t you?
Let\'s skip the part where you break meow heart again.
Revolution made meow an ultimeowte weapon.
I didn\'t want to hurt you or anybody.
Since you want to kill meow so badly...
We could have been so meowch more.
It was the only logical outcome.
Oh, I guess I\'m a part of your genocide? You attacked me for nothing.
Why am I even talking? Words have no effect on you.
Alright, maybe I have your moneys. But I\'m not giving it back!
Theys are honestly earned! Illegally, but honestly.
By the way, where have you got that moneys from? Who\'s the thief here, huh?
You\'re my rival, that\'s who you are.
I am going to steal your soul in Hell.
Ha! You\'ve picked the wrong person to tackle with!
...hope this stops you ...at least in city
Yeah, about that... I\'m not a good fighter. So it\'ll be quick.
Are you just terrible at killing me?
Or you don\'t want to kill me?
Why you don\'t press GIVE UP? One of us has to die.
It\'s kinda unfair, you are stronger than me.
Theys say \'Youthful Folly, you are too irresponsible\'.
Alright. I\'m a grown up. I\'m not crying, you crying!
Tap exit again to return to main menu. All unsaved progress will be lost!
You don\'t know basic skill, so you can\'t obtain its upgrade!
Avalanche crushes opponent with balls of snow, dealing 10 dp.
Fiery Ankh gives \'an extra life\': when you die, time goes back to the beginning of the move.
Combined with Triple Trouble: when you have x3 multiplier, cast it once more to get infinite multiplier. Downside is still the same though: receive damage - you\'re back to x1.
Lady Lake, using time magic, restores 13 hp.
Lightning Strike brings down the electric wrath of the sky. Used to be super effective, but now deals only 10 dp.
Plateau Uppercut is what it is: a giant piece of land flies from the ground right to opponent\'s chin! Deals 20 dp - twice as much as other attacks.
Queen Lake replaces Lady Lake: restores all health when casted.
Timeback moves time back to the beginning of the past move. Kinda OP, if you ask me.
When Triple Trouble is casted, you get x3 multiplier to next attack. Downside: multiplier drops when you receive damage.
Waterball is - surprise! - a ball of water. Moving at the speed of 62.137 mph, it deals 10 dp.
Speak quietly! Creative Heaven hears everything.
I\'m here because they didn\'t like my prank.
I\'m not gonna tell you about it, or they will cut my mouth off.
Oh, wait, you have no mouth?
Everybody knows that, but theys don\'t care.
My pranks are better than jokes and puns of -that- clown.
That\'s why I live near the Temple, and they lives in Hub.
Wait, does they hear us? I mean...
All hail Creative Heaven! Bless them!
Get out before they\'s spotted us.
Please, wander around for some time.
All the time was not enough, apparently.
Go left. You will see saving cell.
I will be waiting for you.
Oy, where do you think you\'re goin\'?! Get back in your cell.
You wanna fight? Hope you ain\'t scared of spiders.
Hello! I am Before Completion, or BC, as theys say.
I\'m here to help you. First of all, let\'s turn on the lights.
Much better. Don\'t mind the dead body in front of me.
Now I\'m to teach you how to fight. It\'s not that difficult.
First of all, tap once the crossed out sword icon in bottom right corner.
When the sword is shining, you\'re in battle mode,
and when it\'s crossed out, you can talk to others!
Now, while you\'re in battle mode, tap me twice, and we\'ll start our fight!
Let\'s get straight to the battle, shall we?
Oh, Madeline, finally. I am very busy right now.
Oh, and don\'t forget those 99 declarations I have to sign.
Someone was requesting \'copy of a copy of a copy\'. Madeline, get into that!

Madeline! How many times I have to remind you that letters from creatures whose name starts with \'A\' should be sorted by length, but letters from creatures whose name ends with \'Y\' must be shuffled!
That\'s highly unprofessional from your side!
Madeline, one more miss like this, and you\'re fired!
Madeline, stop double-tapping me! Don\'t you see I\'m busy!

-MA-DE-LINE!- I\'ve closed my eyes on many mistakes you\'ve made. I\'ve asked you for coffee - you bring me hibiscus tea, if anything! I\'ve asked about declarations - where are theys?! Where are my forms?! I\'ve asked you to find printer - -have you found one?!- None - that\'s how many you\'ve found! But my favorite is this: when I said \'Madeline, give me some papers\', what did you give me?!! Papers, folded into planes! -You\'ve launched those planes into me, MA-DE-LINE!-
You know what, I\'m tired of your excuses. You\'re fired.
Close it on your way out.
Madeline!.. I mean, go away, stranger, whose name I don\'t know.
I\'m off work, I can do whatever I want.
No, it\'s not immature to spend my time in clubs like this one.
You should try it too one day. Relax, Madeline, relax, or else you\'ll burn out.
Wait, are you here because I fired you?
No, Madeline, I\'m not taking you back. Period.
By the way, stalking me here is the worst idea ever produced by your brain.
No, I don\'t want to hear anything, Madeline.
I\'m giving you a day off. Now go, and don\'t bother me anymore.
Get out, Madeline, stop ruining the party.
It can wait, Madeline. It can wait.
Ohhie, what have we got here? No mouth - how brrrrrrrrrave, how frrrrrrresh!
It\'s all eeeeeeevolution. Soon you\'ll be just like me.
I consider myself perrrrrrfect. Big eyes are suprrrrrrrrreme!
Head and blocks are overrrrrrrrrrrrated. I can do without thems.
Are those wings?! Oh myie, how GOTHIC!
You use wheel to move arrrrround? How CYBERFUNKY!
So, you are -the- Bannerman. I imagined you a little bit... tougher.
And I wanted you to talk to me!
